ActJudges Act (Removal Allowance) Order
PrecisOrder prescribing an additional period during which certain RELOCATION EXPENSES may be reimbursed to the Hon. R. SHAWN SMITH, a Judge of Her Majesty's Court of Queen's Bench for Saskatchewan, who was required to move from Regina to Saskatoon.
